mapper.select: select * from USERS where user_id=( select courier_id from REQUESTS where request_id=#{requestId} )
mapper.update: update Users set ( courier_avg_time, courier_avg_safe, courier_avg_kind ) = ( select avg(courier_time), avg(courier_safe), avg(courier_kind) from COURIER_EVALS where courier_id= ( select courier_id from REQUESTS where request_id=#{requestId} ) ) where user_id= ( select courier_id from REQUESTS where request_id=#{requestId} )
